common.store_credit: You have {store_credit} of store credit. To use it, simply place your order and you will be able to choose store credit as the payment method when it comes time to pay for your order.

compare.no_remove: At least 2 products are needed to make a valid comparison.
compare.no_compare: You must select at least two products to compare

redeem.heading: Redeem Gift Certificate
redeem.intro: To redeem a gift certificate at {store_name}, follow the simple steps below.
redeem.item1: You need your unique gift certificate code, which is part of the gift certificate that was emailed to you as an attachment. It will look something like Z50-Y6K-COS-402.
redeem.item2: Browse the store and add items to your cart as you normally would.
redeem.item3: Click the 'View Cart' link to view the contents of your shopping cart.
redeem.item4: Type your gift certificate code in to the 'Redeem Gift Certificate' box and click 'Go'.

balance.heading: Check Gift Certificate Balance
balance.intro: You can check the balance of a gift certificate by typing the code in to the box below.

created.heading: Your account has been created
created.intro: Thank you for creating your account at {store_name}. Your account details have been emailed to {email}

reset_password.intro: Fill in your email below to request a new password. An email will be sent to the address below containing a link to verify your email address.

rss.intro: RSS feeds are used for syndicating regularly changing content on a web site, including this one. You can open an RSS feed using an RSS reader and use it to see if there is any new content on this site or you can set up a server-side script to parse the feed and display it on your web site.
rss.heading: RSS Syndication

blog.heading: Recent Blog Posts
blog.intro: The recent post feed contains the latest {limit} blog posts published on {store}.

new.heading: New Products
new.intro: The latest products feed contains the latest {limit} products added to {store}.

popular.heading: Popular Products
popular.intro: The popular products feed contains the top {limit} most popular products on {store} as rated by users.

featured.heading: Featured Products
featured.intro: The featured products feed contains the latest {limit} featured products on {store}.

search.heading: Product Searches
search.intro1: Product search feeds allow you to save your custom product searches as syndication feed that will always update when there are new results.
search.intro2: To create a product search feed, perform a standard search on {store} and at the bottom of the page click on one of the syndication options.

modals.sign_in_message: Sign in or create an account to purchase TS to You Autoship subscription products.
modals.ready: Ready for TS to You Autoship?
modals.choose_tstu_consultant: Choose your TS to You Consultant
modals.create_account: Create an account to save and manage your subscriptions. You'll also be able to check-out quicker and have the ability to save a wish list just by creating a FREE account with us.
modals.consultant_message_1: It looks like you are a Tastefully Simple consultant. Please, use TS Central Orders to place your Autoship Order.
modals.consultant_message_2: Please return to your cart to remove your subscription products.
modals.choose_consultant: Thanks for being a TS to You Autoship member with #consultant-name. Subscriptions may only be linked to one consultant. Select one below:
modals.current_consultant: Your current TS to You consultant:
modals.new_consultant: The TS to You consultant you selected:
modals.choose_consultant_and_party: Thanks for being a TS to You Autoship member with #consultant-name! This orer contains subscription products and is being placed through #party-name and a new consultant #consultant-new. Subscriptions may only be linked to one consultant.
modals.new_consultant_and_party: Thanks for being a TS to You Autoship member with #current-consultant-name! This order contains subscription products and is being placed through #party-host-name-party party and a new consultant #new-consultant-name.
modals.new_consultant_and_party_keep_1: Keep your current TS to You consultant #current-consultant-name.
modals.new_consultant_and_party_keep_2: Host #party-host-name will *not* be credited with this order
modals.new_consultant_and_party_change_1: Place this order with #party-host-name-party party and change your TS to You Consultant to #new-consultant-name
modals.new_consultant_and_party_change_2: Your TS to You consultant will change to #new-consultant-name. If you wish to place an order with this party, return to your cart and remove subscription product and keep your current TS to You Consultant.

order_confirmation.order_pending_review_text: Your order was sent to us but is currently awaiting payment. Once we receive the payment for your order, it will be completed. If you've already provided payment details then we will process your order manually and send you an email when it's completed.
order_confirmation.order_with_downloadable_digital_items_te: You can download your digital purchases by clicking the links on this page, or by logging into your account at any time. There is also a download link in your confirmation email, which should be arriving shortly.
order_confirmation.order_with_support_number_text: An email will be sent containing information about your purchase. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at help@tastefullysimple.com or call us at {supportPhoneNumber}.
order_confirmation.order_without_downloadable_digital_items: Once we receive your payment, we’ll send a confirmation email with a link to download your digital purchases.
order_confirmation.order_without_support_number_text: An email will be sent containing information about your purchase. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at help@tastefullysimple.com.
order_confirmation.order_status_update_facebook_messenger_h: Get instant updates of your order to Messenger

consent_manager.data_collection_warning: We use cookies (and other similar technologies) to collect data to improve your shopping experience.
consent_manager.use_data_by_cookies: uses data collected by cookies and JavaScript libraries to improve your shopping experience.
consent_manager.data_categories_table: The table below outlines how we use this data by category. To opt out of a category of data collection, select 'No' and save your preferences.
consent_manager.functional_purpose: Enables enhanced functionality, such as videos and live chat. If you do not allow these, then some or all of these functions may not work properly.
consent_manager.analytics_purpose: Provide statistical information on site usage, e.g., web analytics so we can improve this website over time.
consent_manager.advertising_purpose: Used to create profiles or personalize content to enhance your shopping experience.
consent_manager.esential_purpose: Essential for the site and any requested services to work, but do not perform any additional or secondary function.
consent_manager.close_without_changes: You have unsaved changes to your data collection preferences. Are you sure you want to close without saving?
consent_manager.by_using: By using our website, you're agreeing to our
consent_manager.agree_on_data_collection: By using our website, you're agreeing to the collection of data as described in our
consent_manager.change_preferences: You can change your preferences at any time
consent_manager.cancel_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to cancel?

party.tooltip_info: What is a party? Tastefully Simple parties and fundraisers reward hosts of $200+ events with free products. Help us ensure your host gets credit for your order.

consultant.parties_caption: Are you shopping with a party or fundraiser? Make sure your host gets credit for your order.
consultant.tooltip_info: What is a consultant? Our consultants are independent business owners who help you decide what's to eat! Help us ensure your consultant receives their commission or credit.

ts_cart_subscription.create_account_intro: Create an account to save and manage your subscriptions. You'll also be able to check-out quicker and have the ability to save a wish list just by creating a FREE account with us.

popup.title: Welcome Party Palooza Consultant
popup.description: Thanks for attending Party Palooza! We see that you have Marketplace items & standard products in your cart. These exciting Marketplace items must be purchased on a separate order. Please update your cart accordingly.
